def inverse(a, n):
    if a in d:
        return d[a]
    t = 0
    t1 = 1
    r = n
    r1 = a
    while r1 > 0:
        q = r // r1
        tmp = t- q*t1
        t = t1
        t1 = tmp

        tmp = r - q*r1
        r = r1
        r1 = tmp

    if t < 0:
        t += n
    t = (t+n) % n
    d[a] = t
    return t
